mapper.insert: insert into report(report_num, reporter, villain, report_title, report_content) values(report_seq.nextval, #{reporter}, #{villain}, #{report_title}, #{report_content})
mapper.select: select r.report_num,m1.id as reporter, m2.id as villain, r.report_title, r.report_content from report r,member m1, member m2 where r.reporter=m1.user_num and r.villain=m2.user_num and report_num=#{report_num}
select r.report_num,m1.id as reporter, m2.id as villain, r.report_title from report r,member m1, member m2 where r.reporter=m1.user_num and r.villain=m2.user_num order by report_num desc
mapper.update: update member set report_count = report_count+1 where user_num=#{villain}
